name: allergy_identifier
description: Allergy Identifier Flutter app with environment switching

scripts.dev: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh dev && flutter run --flavor dev -t lib/main_dev.dart
scripts.prod: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh prod && flutter run --flavor prod -t lib/main_prod.dart
scripts.chrome:dev: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh dev && flutter run -d chrome -t lib/main_dev.dart
scripts.chrome:prod: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh prod && flutter run -d chrome -t lib/main_prod.dart
scripts.build:web:dev: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh dev && flutter build web --release -t lib/main_dev.dart
scripts.build:web:prod: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh prod && flutter build web --release -t lib/main_prod.dart
scripts.build:apk:dev: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh dev && flutter build apk --release --flavor dev -t lib/main_dev.dart
scripts.build:apk:prod: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh prod && flutter build apk --release --flavor prod -t lib/main_prod.dart
scripts.build:ios:dev: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh dev && flutter build ios --release --flavor dev -t lib/main_dev.dart
scripts.build:ios:prod: bash ./scripts/switch_env.sh prod && flutter build ios --release --flavor prod -t lib/main_prod.dart
